judge.rationale: Results include multiple emails from no-reply@accounts.google.com with subjects containing 'Security alert' (e.g., 'Critical security alert...' and 'Security alert...'). Aggregation also shows accounts.google.com entries. This meets the expectation.
Results include multiple emails titled 'OpenAI @ UC Berkeley' from a GPTDAO sender, matching the expected UC Berkeley event announcement and helping the user locate it.
Matches include a recent Yelp email ('Wait, how was Beastea?') indicating a review request, aligning with the expectation; no contradictory info.

Matches include Bandsintown notifications referencing LANY (Soft World Tour, presale code, tickets available) and a Bandsintown welcome email; aggregation groups senders by Bandsintown domains. This aligns with the request and expectation.
Matches include five Upwork ‘New job alert’ emails with subjects that briefly describe each job, which is sufficient for a concise summary. No contradictory or incorrect details.

Includes a weekly thread summary for the 'OpenAI @ UC Berkeley' thread (thread_week 19a17f6c6714d2be, 2025-W43) with executive paragraph, actionable bullets, and tags covering OpenAI/UC Berkeley/event context. No contradictory information.

The monthly summary (Oct 2025) includes explicit job alert themes (AI/automation roles: LLM/agent/RAG, n8n/Make, full‑stack; Upwork/LinkedIn alerts) satisfying a job‑alert highlights rollup. While it also includes other tasks, it still provides the required monthly job alert context. Aggregation is empty but not needed.

All returned messages are marked unread and have dates greater than the received_after checkpoint (1760918400), satisfying the 'since last run' requirement. No older items are present, indicating minimal overlap. Aggregation aligns with the 5 results (1 Streamlit, 4 LinkedIn).

Matches include emails with attachment metadata: two items have has_attachments=true (from brook@thrv.com on 2025-10-23 and chan@theburntapp.com on 2025-10-23), with subjects, dates, and other fields. This satisfies the request for recent emails with attachments.
